title: Cooking

verbs: Cook on a hot surface using fat
To prepare a meal or a single dish.
nouns: Frying is the cooking of food in oil or another fat, a technique that originated in ancient Egypt around 2500 BC.
Saut√©ing is a method of cooking food, that uses a small amount of oil or fat in a shallow pan over relatively high heat.
Cooking in fat or oil in a pan or griddle
The act of cooking food in oil or fat
Any vessel (such as a saucepan), with or without a lid, used to cook food
A cylindrical receptacle about as tall as it is wide, with one long handle, usually made of metal, used for cooking in the home
Cylindrical receptacle with one long handle.
Cookware and bakeware are types of food preparation containers, commonly found in a kitchen.
Where the name is used.
Metal or earthenware cooking vessel that is usually round and deep; often has a handle and lid
A generic kitchen utensil used for cooking food by boiling, frying or other methods.
Breakfast is the first meal taken after rising from a night's sleep, most often eaten in the early morning before undertaking the day's work.
First meal of the day.
The first meal of the day (usually in the morning)
The first meal of the day, usually eaten in the morning.
First meal eaten in the early morning
Animal reproductive body consisting of an ovum or embryo together with nutritive and protective envelopes; especially the thin-shelled reproductive body laid by e.g. female birds
Body housing an embryo.
An approximately spherical or ellipsoidal body produced by birds, snakes, insects and other animals, housing the embryo during its development.
An approximately spherical or ellipsoidal body produced by birds, snakes, insects and other animals housing the embryo during its development.
The act of preparing a meal.
The act of preparing something (as food) by the application of heat
Cooking or cookery is the art of preparing food for consumption with the use of heat.
The art and practice of preparing food for consumption, especially by the application of heat; cooking.
Cooking is the process of preparing food by use of heat, or through chemical reactions without the presence of heat.
Art of preparing food for consumption with the use of heat
The process of preparing food by using heat.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.
A room equipped for preparing meals
Space, which is primarily used for preparation and in part to the storage of food
A room or area for preparing food.
A kitchen is a room or part of a room used for cooking and food preparation.
A room equipped for preparing and cooking food.

description:
An egg with yolk frying in a skillet, as prepared sunny-side up. Though associated with breakfast, the emoji represents the general action of cooking and related concepts.

An early Apple design included broken eggshells and did not feature a skillet, while an early Samsung design simply displayed a fried egg.
apple_vendor_description: The cooking emoji on Apple devices depicts a chef's hat perched atop a steaming pot, a classic emblem of culinary preparation.  Apple's signature glossy finish and realistic lighting give the hat a polished sheen and the steam a delicate, ethereal quality.  The smooth gradients and soft rounded edges of the pot suggest a sense of warmth and delicious anticipation, making this emoji on Apple devices an ideal representation of preparing food, enjoying a meal, or expressing a passion for gastronomy.
